abilities.description: Injects the target with hormones that provide a full day's worth of adrenaline and energy, allowing them to continue fighting despite exhaustion. However, this technique reduces the target's lifespan.
abilities.limitations: Reduces the target's lifespan with each use. The energy boost is temporary and the body will eventually demand rest.

keyMoments.title: Emporio Tension Hormone Debut
keyMoments.description: Ivankov uses the Emporio Tension Hormone technique for the first time in the anime, injecting Luffy with hormones to give him energy despite his weakened state.
keyMoments.significance: Debuts an important technique that allows Luffy to continue his rescue mission despite his body's condition after the poison treatment.

reveals.information: The Horu Horu no Mi can create Emporio Tension Hormones that provide adrenaline but reduce lifespan

abilities.description: Allows the user to turn their hands into scissors and cut through virtually anything as if it were paper, including solid objects. The user can also create objects from the cut materials.

keyMoments.title: Creates Clothes for Luffy
keyMoments.description: Inazuma uses the Choki Choki no Mi to create new clothes for Luffy, demonstrating the practical applications of the fruit's powers.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how the Choki Choki no Mi can be used for practical purposes beyond combat.
